features: FOR NOURISHED, HEALTHY SKIN: Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Lotion locks in moisture and deeply nourishes for healthy-looking skin
FORMULATED WITH ULTRA-HYDRATING LIPIDS: This body lotion for dry skin is formulated with Pure Oat Extract and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture
FEEL THE DIFFERENCE: This body lotion for dry skin is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin)
NON-GREASY FEEL: This fast-acting body lotion absorbs quickly to leave your skin hydrated without feeling greasy
RECYCLED PLASTIC: This Vaseline Intensive Care body moisturizer bottle is made of 50% recycled plastic. Our ambition is to get to 100% recycled plastic in the near future
EQUITABLE SKIN CARE FOR ALL: Skin health is essential for well-being. We’re helping those underserved get better care for their skin
body.description: Vaseline Intensive Care Essential Healing is now Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture. Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture lotion locks in moisture and deeply nourishes for healthy-looking skin. This body lotion is formulated with Pure Oat Extract and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture. With daily exposure to environmental triggers (like wind, lack of humidity, and sun), skin's natural moisture barrier can break down, allowing for water to escape the skin. But the Ultra-Hydrating lipids in our lotion fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture to allow the skin's natural barrier to recover. This lotion locks in moisture and promotes smooth, naturally glowing skin. The body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more skin moisture (vs. untreated skin). This body lotion for dry skin absorbs fast for rich moisturization without the residue and provides 48-hour moisture. Use this dermatologist-tested body lotion daily on dry, rough skin for stronger, noticeably healthy skin. Just apply to your skin for hydrating relief. This Vaseline lotion bottle is made of 50% recycled plastic. Our ambition is to get to 100% recycled plastic in the near future.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vaseline Intensive Care Nourishing Moisture Lotion, with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Pure Oat Extract, moisturizes and nourishes for healthy-looking skin. This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more skin moisture (vs. untreated skin).

NOURISHING MOISTURE Deeply moisturizes for nourished, healthy-looking skin. HYDRATING INGREDIENTS Our formula contains Pure Oat Extract and Ultra-Hydrating that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture. FEEL THE DIFFERENCE This non-greasy body lotion provides 48-hour moisture. A LOTION FOR EVERY SKIN Vaseline has a range of products to help heal, soothe, and moisturize all skin types.

Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Vaseline Intensive Care Calm Healing Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Main Benefit The Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair lotion, with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Vaseline Jelly, moisturizes and repairs extremely dry skin. The Vaseline Intensive Care Cocoa Radiant Lotion, with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Pure Cocoa Butter, moisturizes skin for a long-lasting, radiant glow. The Vaseline Intensive Care Calm Healing lotion, with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Lavender Extract, soothes and restores dry skin.
